trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir data for musen relatert rutet hendelser som ikke spesielt inneholder museknappen eller musehjulet, for eksempel <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen data klassen brukes med følgende vedlagte hendelser.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>Denne data hendelsesklasse brukes med følgende rutet hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Disse rutet hendelsene videresende er oppført ovenfor vedlagte hendelsene for å gjøre dem mer tilgjengelig for generell elementet modellen i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>Vedlagte hendelser og base elementet rutet-hendelser dele hendelsesdataene sine, og den Bobling og tunnelering versjoner av distribuert hendelsene også dele Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan påvirke håndtert egenskaper for hendelsen underveis hendelsen-ruten.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Other than the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of MouseEventArgs that you might use in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> implementation are several properties that expose the current button state (such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A>) and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Other than den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>Egenskaper som er relevante for alle rutet hendelser, mest interessante egenskaper for MouseEventArgs som du kan bruke i en <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>implementering finnes flere egenskaper som viser gjeldende status for knappen (eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A>) og <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.LeftButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A> is useful particularly because you can check <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A> on it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>er nyttig spesielt fordi du kan se <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A>på det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Captured%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs.MouseDevice%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different event data class, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hendelser som spesifikt gjelder musen knappen hendelser bruke en annen data hendelsesklasse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The mouse button properties are available on MouseEventArgs in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for mus-knappen er tilgjengelig på MouseEventArgs i tilfelle det er inndata modus eller bruk som involverer knappene selv om du behandler en ikke-hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref> and timestamp
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref> og tidsstempel

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Musen-enhet som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Klokkeslettet da inndataene ble utført.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"></xref>, timestamp, and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice"> </xref>, tidsstempel og <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Musen-enhet som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Klokkeslettet da inndataene ble utført.

trans-unit.source: The logical stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den logiske stylus enheten som er forbundet med denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer posisjonen for musepekeren i forhold til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the frame of reference.
trans-unit.target: Punktet (0,0) er øvre venstre hjørne av referansen.

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can also be used to obtain the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Statiske <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden kan også brukes til å hente plasseringen av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GetPosition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Elementet skal brukes som referansen for posisjonen for pekeren.

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: X - og y-koordinatene for posisjon for musen pekeren i forhold til det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer hendelsesbehandling på en måte typespesifikke, noe som kan øke hendelsen system effektivitet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kaster generisk behandlingsprogrammet som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>og aktiverer det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer informasjon om denne implementeringen mønsteret og årsaker til den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>og [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Generell behandlingsprogrammet å kalle på en typespesifikke måte.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Målet å kalle behandlingsprogrammet på.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Henter den gjeldende tilstanden til venstre museknappen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the left mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende tilstanden til den venstre museknappen som er enten <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the middle mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for den midterste museknappen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the middle mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende status for den midterste museknappen som er enten <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Henter musen enheten som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The mouse device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Musen-enhet som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for Høyreklikk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the right mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende tilstanden til høyre museknappen, som er enten <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Henter stylus enheten som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The stylus associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stylus som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the first extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende status for den første utvidede museknappen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the first extended mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende status for den første utvidede museknappen, som er enten <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for andre utvidede museknappen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klassen gir flere egenskaper og metoder for å fastslå tilstanden til musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the second extended mouse button, which is either <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende tilstanden til den andre utvidede museknappen, som er enten <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen standardverdi.
